languages.text: Благодаря усилиям Вольного Торговца и жертве старших офицеров мостика, остальные отсеки корабля смогли подавить панику и малыми жертвами справиться со взбесившимися машинными духами. Критичных докладов нет.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря усилиям Вольного Торговца и жертве старших офицеров мостика, остальные отсеки корабля смогли подавить панику и малыми жертвами справиться с взбесившимися машинными духами. Критичных докладов нет. Унтер-офицеры отсеков готовы исполнять приказы Лорда-капитана в любой момент.

languages.text: Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.
languages.original_text: Благодаря усилиям Вольного Торговца и жертве старших офицеров мостика, остальные отсеки корабля смогли подавить панику и малыми жертвами справиться со взбесившимися машинными духами. Критичных докладов нет.

traits.locale_text: Due to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's modules were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports to be delivered.

Due to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's modules were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports to be delivered.

Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's modules were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's modules were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

languages.text: Gracias a los esfuerzos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y al sacrificio de los oficiales superiores del puente, el resto de compartimentos de la nave logra contener el pánico y acallar la furia de los espíritus máquina con pocas bajas. No hay más situaciones críticas.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a los esfuerzos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y al sacrificio de los oficiales superiores del puente, el resto de módulos de la nave logra contener el pánico y acallar la furia de los espíritus máquina con pocas bajas. No hay más situaciones críticas.

languages.text: 由于行商浪人的努力与舰桥上高阶军官的自我牺牲，舰船的其他区域很快就度过了恐慌，抑制住了狂躁的机魂。没有造成太多伤亡，也没有发生危急情况。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

traits.locale_text: 由于行商浪人的努力与舰桥上高阶军官的自我牺牲，舰船的其他区域很快就度过了恐慌，抑制住了狂躁的机魂。没有造成太多伤亡，也没有发生危急情况。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の頑張りとブリッジの上級士官の犠牲のおかげで、船の残りの区画のパニックを防ぎ、ほとんど死傷者を出さずに荒れ狂う機械精霊に対処できた。批判的な報告は出ていない。
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の頑張りとブリッジの上級士官の犠牲のおかげで、船の残りの区画のパニックを防ぎ、ほとんど死傷者を出さずに荒れ狂う機械精霊に対処できた。批判的な報告は出ていない。

languages.text: Dank der Bemühungen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und des Opfers der leitenden Offiziere auf der Brücke konnten die übrigen Module des Schiffs eine Panik verhindern und die tobenden Maschinengeister mit wenig Verlusten ruhigstellen. Keine kritischen Berichte.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

languages.text: Grâce aux efforts {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et au sacrifice des officiers supérieurs de la passerelle, les autres compartiments du vaisseau ont réussi à réprimer la panique et à calmer les esprits de la machine enragés, en ne déplorant que quelques victimes. Les rapports ne font état d'aucune situation critique.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

traits.locale_text: Grâce aux efforts {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et au sacrifice des officiers supérieurs sur le pont, les autres modules du vaisseau ont réussi à réprimer la panique et à calmer les esprits de la machine enragés, en ne déplorant que quelques victimes. Les rapports ne font état d'aucune situation critique.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in çabaları ve kıdemli köprü subaylarının fedakârlığı sayesinde geminin geri kalan kompartımanlarında panik bastırıldı ve az sayıda kayıp verilerek öfkeli makine ruhlarıyla başa çıkılabildi. Kritik bir durum yok.
languages.original_text: Thanks to the Rogue Trader's efforts and the sacrifice of the senior bridge officers, the rest of the ship's compartments were able to suppress the panic and deal with the raging machine spirits with few casualties. No critical reports.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in çabaları ve kıdemli köprü subaylarının fedakârlığı sayesinde geminin geri kalan kompartımanları paniği bastırabildi ve az sayıda kayıp vererek öfkeli makine ruhlarıyla başa çıkabildi. Kritik bir durum yok.
